# Unity generated files
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
[Mm]emoryCaptures/

# Asset meta data should only be ignored when the corresponding asset is ignored
#!/[Aa]ssets/**/*.meta

# Uncomment this line if you have Unity 2020.1 or later to ignore artifact folders
#**/[Aa]ssets/**/*.Artifacts/

# Crash reports
*.pidb
*.symbols
*.userprefs
*.booproj
*.bak
*.swp

# Exclude auto-generated files for asset processing
# Ignore temporary asset files
[Aa]ssets/*~.*

# Visual Studio / MonoDevelop project files
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
*.ide
*.sln.docstates

# Rider project files
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Other generated files
.DS_Store
*.apk
*.keystore
*.jsc
*.pdb
*.mdb
*.exe
*.so
*.dll
*.pfx
*.rsp
*.json

# Cache directories
.cache/
Thumbs.db
*.assetlist
*.assets

# Unity Cloud Build
[Uu]ser[Uu]serBuildSettings.asset

# Unity Play Mode test runner results
TestResults/

# WebGL files
/[Bb]uild/[Ww]eb[Gg][Ll]/Build/
